thread.title: Olam Buys Archer Daniels’s Cocoa Business for $1.2 Billion
thread.title_full: Olam Buys Archer Daniels’s Cocoa Business for $1.2 Billion - WSJ

author: Katherine Dunn
title: Olam Buys Archer Daniels’s Cocoa Business for $1.2 Billion
text:
Trading company Olam said Friday it had acquired Archer Daniels Midland’s global cocoa business for $1.2 billion, extending the Singapore-based company’s position from sourcing raw cocoa to processing the beans into the powders and butters used to make chocolate.
The deal, first announced in December and set at $1.3 billion, marked Chicago-based ADM’s intention to exit the cocoa business, and signaled another move toward consolidation... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
